item.description: Scaling InnerSource InnerSource Program Office Executive Sponsorship Pattern: Review Committee Pattern: Start as an Experiment Dedicated Staffing Pattern: Dedicated Community Leader InnerSource Program as an InnerSource Project (lead by example) Governance of InnerSource Programs Company leadership support Unblock policy constraints Pattern: Contracted Contributor Pattern: InnerSource License SBOMs for InnerSource projects Applying OpenChain and SBOMs for InerSource Accelerated contributions Systems Book: Managing InnerSource Projects, chapters Infrastructure and Tooling Pattern: Service vs.
